metadata.name: The Sound of Silence
metadata.description:
The idea of this painting formed in my mind (as usual) when I was deeply meditating, seeing something softly creeping on me. It left its seeds while I was sleeping. A green tree emerged from my dream and covered me up in the peace of water. The vision that was planted in my mind still remains. It fills me like a restless dream, Within the sound of silence.

resolution = 1500*2000
bit rate = 10411K
frame rate = 25 FPS
format = mp4
Software = PS, AE

Original painting in Watercolor 24"x18"
Motion designer: mlico
Instagram: @work.sajad.moradi
twitter: @mlicooo
